title: Top 10 Free macOS Apps for Productivity
description: For past few months, Ive been building a list of free productivity apps for macOS. And I finally have a solid list, which Im really excited to share with you guys.  Download link  Itsycal   Copia   Pearl   Be Focused   Timeout   Usage - battery health monitor   Quitter   Monosnap    Space launch   Cleaner for Memory   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -    What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mic do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  What computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
